title: RPA Specialist
description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Robotic Process Automation (RPA) Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing RPA solutions to streamline business processes, increase efficiency, and reduce operational costs across our organization.

Key Responsibilities
- Analyze existing business processes and identify opportunities for automation
- Design and develop RPA solutions using tools such as UiPath, Blue Prism, or Automation Anywhere
- Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications
- Create process definition documents (PDDs) and solution design documents (SDDs)
- Develop, test, and deploy RPA bots to automate repetitive tasks and workflows
- Ensure the quality and performance of RPA solutions through thorough testing and debugging
- Provide technical support and troubleshooting for implemented RPA solutions
- Stay updated on the latest RPA technologies and best practices
- Train and mentor junior team members on RPA development and best practices
- Monitor and optimize the performance of RPA bots and processes
- Collaborate with IT teams to ensure proper integration of RPA solutions with existing systems

Qualifications
- 2-3+ years of experience in RPA development and implementation
- Strong proficiency in at least one major RPA platform (UiPath, Blue Prism, or Automation Anywhere)
- Experience with process analysis and optimization
- Solid understanding of business process management concepts
- Familiarity with programming languages such as VB.NET, C#, or Python
- Knowledge of SQL and database management systems
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team

Preferred Qualifications
- RPA certifications (e.g., UiPath Certified Professional, Blue Prism Developer, Automation Anywhere Certified Advanced RPA Professional)
- Experience with process mining tools
- Knowledge of AI and machine learning concepts
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies

Benefits:

-PTO (Vacation Leave) that increases every year that you are with us
-Separate PTO for Sick Leave
-Maternity and Paternity Leave
-Bereavement Leave
-Evaluation and opportunity for raises every 4 months from start date.
-Opportunity! All our positions have multi-tiered levels so you can get promoted in a matter of months. You get a detailed breakdown of what the qualifications are for every position and their respected levels, as well as the requirements and responsibilities that come with them.


How To Apply: Copy the link below and fill out the form.
forms.zohopublic.com/mpowersolutions/form/JobApplication/formperma/cv0GXCrF6ovWYHFSHBBY1OL904iFdDWVfjM7nc7wKkY

title: »»» Strategic Sr. WordPress Developer × Full-Time Perks! «««
description:
As a Senior WordPress Developer, you will ensure our sites run smoothly and perform optimally. You will drive business growth through development and integration, ensuring our business system applications deliver measurable value. As the go-to expert for our web solutions, you will leverage your skills in development, testing, and deployment to achieve outstanding results.

Key Responsibilities:
-Maintain and enhance company-owned websites.
-Handle specialized and ad hoc requests for research, technical information, and customized solutions.
-Develop solutions to problems using a disciplined development process.
-Quickly and independently learn new technologies and evaluate new plugins and tools.
-Research best practices and recommend solutions.
-Design using the latest WordPress environment and follow best practices in development, testing, and deployment.
-Code WordPress themes and plugins from scratch.

Qualifications:
-4 to 7 years of demonstrated on-the-job programming experience
-3 to 5 years of WordPress development experience
-Strong understanding of information systems and application architecture standards
-In-depth knowledge of CSS, HTML5, and other front-end technologies
-Proficiency in web-based programming languages (JavaScript, PHP, etc.)
-Comfortable with both OOP and procedural programming methodologies
-Knowledge of database design and troubleshooting
-Experience with MySQL database management
-Experience with Elementor and Genesis Framework
-Expertise in WordPress, specifically:
-Child Themes
-Custom Post Types
-Advanced Custom Fields
-Syncing DEV and PROD environments
-Hooks/Actions/Filters
-Debugging/Security
-Ability to convert PSD mock-ups to posts and pages
-Basic SEO knowledge
-Familiarity with responsive design and website speed optimization

Basic Requirements:
-Device Specifications: Intel i5 processor or higher with a minimum of 8GB RAM
-Equipment: Webcam, speakers, and a microphone or headphones
-Internet Speed: Minimum of 100Mbps with a backup connection for outages

Work Details:
Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8 AM to 5 PM Pacific Standard Time | Tuesday to Saturday, 12 AM to 8 AM Manila Time
Location: Anywhere in the Philippines

Why Join Us?
-Stable employment
-Competitive salary
-Bi-monthly salary
-A-Z benefits, including bonuses and annual raises
-Work-life balance 
-Work-from-home opportunity

*** The company uses a time tracker and maintains a virtual office setup via Google Meet.
For interested applicants, kindly send your CV to hr@arashlaw.ph or here at arashlaw.ph/apply/

(Note: DO NOT SEND YOUR APPLICATION through our websites or social media platforms. FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THIS INSTRUCTION may result in DISQUALIFICATION)

title: Assistant Property Manager for a Real Estate Company
description:
A well established, rapidly growing residential real estate company in the District of Columbia is seeking 2 Assistant Property Managers who are responsible, organized, detail oriented, and reliable to join our fun/hard working team. You must have excellent communication skills.

Duties and Responsibilities:

- Request Proposals.
- Execute Building Repairs & Maintenance.
- Create/Update Work Orders.
- Search and Provide Information the Boards ask for from the Assistant Property Manager.
- File Documents.
- Assist with Homeowner Inquirement.
- Assist with Insurance Related Items.
- Updated Service Contracts.
- New Tenant Leases.
- Budget Tasks.
- File Management.
- Handle Check Requests.
- Review Accounts.
- Complete Date Entry for clients.
- Invoice Research.
- Audit Requests.
- Payment Arrangements for Utility Bills.
- Experience in HOA Management is a PLUS, but NOT required.
- Must have at least 1 year of remote working experience.

Working Hours: 9:00 am – 5:00 pm EST; Monday – Friday

Benefits:

HMO and PTOs after 90 days.

How to apply:

1. Please check out website: www.ejfrealestate.com
2. Send me an email attachment with you updated resume in PDF format.
3. Please indicate that you're comfortable to start with $5 USD per hour.

Kindly send your application to christine.ledesma@ejfrealestate.com. On the subject line, kindly indicate the position Assistant Property Manager - your name.

*Applicants who will apply through onlinejobs.ph will not be considered.

title: Let's build some automations with Clay, Make and Airtable
description: If you have extensive experience with building (from scratch) advanced automations with Clay, Make and Airtable, please reply with descriptive examples of your prior work. Also, making basic API calls between applications is a MUST-have requirement.

title: Virtual Assistant - Sales & Marketing Specialist
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and tech-savvy Virtual Assistant who specializes in sales, marketing, and administrative support to enhance our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be an experienced user of HubSpot, adept at managing sales funnels, and experienced in lead generation strategies. This role requires proficiency in Canva for creating engaging content, excellent organizational skills, and a solid understanding of social media dynamics.

Responsibilities:
Set up and manage CRM automations for marketing and sales efforts.
Design and generate newsletters to engage our audience and communicate updates.
Handle social media management, including content scheduling and engagement.
Provide support in creating presentations and marketing materials.
Serve as a thought partner, contributing ideas for improving processes and strategies.
Maintain organization of digital files and marketing resources.
Conduct market research and analyze data to inform marketing strategies.
Collaborate with the team to ensure alignment of marketing efforts with business goals.

Requirements:
Proven experience with CRM, including CRM and marketing automation tools.
Strong understanding of sales funnels and lead generation techniques.
Proficient in using Canva for graphic design and content creation.
Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Strong analytical skills and ability to use data to drive decision-making.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Experience in billing and financial administration is a plus.

Possible Skills:
Content Creation / Scheduling
Copy Writing 
Email Marketing
Graphic Design / Canva
CRM Experience
CRM Setup
LinkedIn - Lead Generation
Newsletters Creation
Newsletter Management
Podcast Setup
Podcast Management
Sales Funnel
Shopify
Ad Campaigns

Qualifications:
At least 2 years of experience in digital marketing or a related field.
Familiarity with various tech stacks and tools aimed at increasing business efficiency.
A proactive approach and a keen interest in technology and marketing trends.

title: Digital Media and Process Specialist
description:
Working Hours: Night Shift

Position Overview
We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Digital Media and Workflow Specialist to join our client’s dynamic team. This role involves a wide array of digital media responsibilities starting from client onboarding down to the media and design operation. The ideal candidate will be proficient with Dropbox, JotForm, Zapier, and Slack, and shall have expertise using Monday.com and Wix.

Key Responsibilities
• Manage and streamline the onboarding process for new clients using Monday.com.
• Oversee the entire video request process from inception to completion.
• Use Monday.com to track and manage video requests.
• Handle custom template requests through Monday.com.
• Ensure timely delivery and quality of custom templates.
• Provide support for accounts and request revisions using Monday.com and Gmail.
• Conduct quality checks on video outputs.
• Use Monday.com and Dropbox to manage video output quality.
• Assign projects to Template Artists.
• Manage the template request process through the development and approval stages.
• Oversee payment processes for Template Artists.
• Ensure backend integration of KPX templates using Monday.com, Dropbox, JotForm, and Zapier.
• Confirm template format and requirements.
• Create, integrate, and test JotForm.
• Develop and maintain Dropbox and Dataclay Zaps.
• Maintain and update backend templates.
• Add templates to the Wix CMS Library.
• Ensure front-end template maintenance.
• Maintain and optimize existing workflow processes and integrations using Monday.com, Make, Slack, and Google Workstation.
• Assist with social media marketing on platforms like Wix, LinkedIn, Instagram, and Facebook.

Qualifications
• More than 2 years of experience in project and work management.
• Strong understanding and expertise of Monday.com and Wix are REQUIRED.
• Proven experience with Dropbox, JotForm, Zapier, Slack, and Google Workstation.
• Strong organizational and project management skills.
• Ability to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
• Attention to detail and commitment to quality.

Preferred Skills
• Experience in digital media space.
• Familiarity with video production processes.
• Understanding of backend and frontend template integration.
• Knowledge of social media marketing strategies.

Benefits
-13th Month Pay
-HMO & SSS payment on top of the salary (After a 90-day probationary period)
-Personal Time Off (After a 90-day probationary period)

If interested and want to start the application, kindly click the below link and take the "Pre-Employment Assessment" test.

https://www.ondemandassessment.com/link/index/JB-4K50KLXUQ?u=1136128

Apply now!

title: Expert VA | Full time Funding/Loan Submission Coordinator
description:
Please apply using this link in order to be prioritized: 

https://zurl.to/YCkY?source=CareerSite


Day-To-Day:

Your day-to-day activities will revolve around:

Verifying application information
Send submissions to lender network through SalesForce
Send submissions through lender portals in accordance with direction from management
Document verification and packaging
Bank and financial statement file control in tandem with Ocrolus automation
May collaborate with loan officers, underwriters, and other team members for efficient processing.
Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of loan applications, approvals, and denials.
Stay updated on industry trends, regulations, and best practices related to loan processing and underwriting.
Adhere to compliance guidelines and internal policies to ensure a high level of integrity and risk management.

Requirements:

About You

You will thrive in this role if you have:
Strong understanding of the US financial industry, especially related to consumer finance
Knowledge of credit ratings, their implications and how they impact financing decisions
Familiarity with basic standard and practices of financing in the U.S.
One to two-plus years of experience working in small business funding.
Strong multitasking abilities in a high-energy/fast-paced environment.
Effective and prioritization skills.
Drive for delivering results
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Salesforce experience is heavily preferred.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office, Outlook, Excel, PowerPoint, and Word.

Desired Skills:

Excellent communication skills
Attention to detail
Ability to handle queries professionally and maintain a customer centric approach
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.



Benefits:

Competitive salary package
Great culture
HMO
PTO

title: Business Metrics & Sales Tracker Specialst
description:
We are looking for a meticulous Business Metrics & Sales Tracker Specialist to create and manage comprehensive tracking systems (Excel, Google Sheets, etc.) for all essential business metrics.

*Key Responsibilities:*

- *Data Tracking:* Design and manage an organized and efficient system to track key business and sales metrics.
- *Reporting:* Compile weekly, monthly, and quarterly reports for performance reviews.
- *Analysis:* Provide insights and recommendations based on the data collected.
- *Automation:* Implement and optimize automated tracking and reporting processes where possible.
- *Metrics Management:* Track and report on specific metrics including:
- Number of booked calls per week
- Number of show-ups
- Number of closed deals
- Cash collection
- Monthly revenue
- Expenses tracking
- Number of cancellations
- Retention rate
- Churn rate

*Requirements:*

- *Experience:* Proven experience in creating and managing detailed tracking systems using Excel, Google Sheets, or similar tools.
- *Skills:* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Proficiency in data visualization and report generation.
- *Detail-Oriented:* Exceptional attention to detail to ensure data accuracy and reliability.
- *Communication:* Strong written and verbal communication skills for clear reporting and documentation.
- *Qualifications:* Relevant qualifications in business, analytics, or a related field are preferred.

*Do Not Apply If:*

- You lack substantial experience in creating and managing complex tracking systems.
- You are not comfortable working with extensive data sets.
- You cannot deliver precise and detailed reports on a regular basis.
